body:
<!--*Please add a concise summary of your suggestion here.*-->
Hi, 

lammps new package **USER-MEAMC** cannot be built through spack with the latest Safe version lammps20200505.

The package **USER-MEAMC** fully replaces the original **MEAM** package, which has been removed from LAMMPS after the 12 December 2018 version. 

As for the latest Safe version lammps-20200505, **meam** is listed in the variants. It should be replaced with **USER-MEAMC**.

Variants: 
meam [off]                     on, off                 Activate the meam package

Thanks.






- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: lammps new package USER-MEAMC (It replaces the original package MEAM)
